meanings.definition: Showing a strong interest in or appreciation for the arts.
meanings.sent1: She has an artsie room filled with paintings and sculptures.
meanings.sent2: The artsie community gathered to admire the new gallery exhibit.
meanings.sent3: The artsie group organized a paint night for charity.
meanings.sent4: Her artsie spirit shines through in every brushstroke.
meanings.sent5: The artsie atmosphere of the theater was enchanting.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a creative or unconventional style.
meanings.sent1: His artsie fashion sense always turns heads.
meanings.sent2: The artsie film director took bold risks in storytelling.
meanings.sent3: The artsie hairstyle she tried was a colorful surprise.
meanings.sent4: The artsie design of the building was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: Her artsie approach to cooking resulted in unique dishes.

meanings.definition: A person who is involved in or knowledgeable about the arts.
meanings.sent1: She is an artsie who frequents art galleries and museums.
meanings.sent2: The artsie shared insights on the latest art trends.
meanings.sent3: The artsie was the star of the local art club.
meanings.sent4: The artsie's passion for creativity inspired others.
meanings.sent5: The artsie's expertise in art history was impressive.
